author: Michał Rogucki
title: Kanye West Offers Apology to Jewish Community Amidst Controversy
text:
Kanye West Offers Apology to Jewish Community Amidst Controversy
An analysis by TMZ suggests that the recent apology issued by the artist formerly known as Kanye West, now simply Ye, directed towards the Jewish community may not have been penned by the musician himself. Technology seems to have played a role in composing the message that Ye shared. Language detection tools, such as the one provided by Scribbr, assessed the text’s originality and indicated an 85 percent probability that the apology was produced by an artificial intelligence chatbot, possibly like OpenAI’s ChatGPT or Google’s Bard.
In the contested statement, Ye expressed regret over previous statements he made that were deemed offensive to the Jewish community. His controversial remarks had encompassed the spread of conspiracy theories and an expression of admiration for Adolf Hitler during a discussion with Alex Jones. Ye made it clear in his apology that causing harm was never his intention and that he is earnest in his desire to make amends and foster unity. The artist also affirmed his commitment to educate himself, enhancing his sensitivity and comprehension going forward, and highlighted the value he places on the Jewish community’s forgiveness and understanding.
Despite the suspicion around its creation, the narrative remains focused on Ye’s accountability and willingness to bridge gaps created by his actions. This episode is another reminder of the complexities surrounding public figures and their interactions in the digital age, where authenticity is often scrutinized.
**FAQs About the Article on Ye’s Apology to the Jewish Community**
What is the main finding of the TMZ analysis regarding Ye’s apology?
The analysis suggests that the apology issued by the artist formerly known as Kanye West, now Ye, to the Jewish community may not have been written by him. A language detection tool indicated an 85 percent probability that the message was composed by an AI chatbot.
What tools were used to analyze the originality of Ye’s apology?
Language detection tools, such as the one provided by Scribbr, were used to assess the text’s originality.
What did Ye apologize for in his statement?
Ye apologized for previous remarks that were offensive to the Jewish community. These included spreading conspiracy theories and expressing admiration for Adolf Hitler during a conversation with Alex Jones.
What was Ye’s intention in his apology?
Ye stated that causing harm was never his intention. He expressed his desire to make amends, foster unity, and commit to educating himself to improve his understanding and sensitivity.
How has technology influenced the controversy surrounding public figures’ communications?
Technology, especially AI, has introduced complexities in determining the authenticity of statements issued by public figures, leading to increased scrutiny of their interactions in the digital age.
Definitions of Key Terms and Jargon:
– An artificial intelligence chatbot is a software application that uses artificial intelligence (AI) to mimic human conversation. Chatbots like OpenAI’s ChatGPT or Google’s Bard can generate text-based responses similar to a human.
– Scribbr is a company that offers language editing and plagiarism detection services often used to assess academic texts.
– Originality check refers to the process of analyzing a piece of text to determine the likelihood that it was created by the individual who shared it, as opposed to being derived from another source.
Related Links:
TMZ
OpenAI
Scribbr
Michał Rogucki is a pioneering figure in the field of renewable energy, particularly known for his work on solar power innovations. His research and development efforts have significantly advanced solar panel efficiency and sustainability. Rogucki’s commitment to green energy solutions is also evident in his advocacy for integrating renewable sources into national power grids. His groundbreaking work not only contributes to the scientific community but also plays a crucial role in promoting environmental sustainability and energy independence. Rogucki’s influence extends beyond academia, impacting industry practices and public policy regarding renewable energy.

author: 新闻中心 编辑：诸葛之伊 责任编辑：叶双莲 监制：张佳玮
title: 瑞湖高速首座隧道贯通 标志着瑞安东西向交通大动脉建设取得阶段性成果-新闻中心-温州网
text:
瑞湖高速首座隧道贯通 标志着瑞安东西向交通大动脉建设取得阶段性成果
温州都市报
2025-07-11 08:47:43
温州网讯 近日，瑞湖高速工程建设迎来重要进展——君子石2号隧道爆破贯通，成为该工程全线首座贯通的隧道。这一突破性进展标志着瑞安东西向交通大动脉建设取得阶段性成果，为项目如期建成通车奠定了坚实基础。
瑞湖高速是瑞安市交通建设的里程碑工程，项目总投资189.34亿元，全长37.2公里，总体呈东西走向，起于甬台温高速公路复线瑞安东互通，止于湖岭镇鹿木，共设5个互通。此次贯通的君子石2号隧道位于二标段，全长594米，净宽14.5米，净高5米，以四级围岩为主，施工难度较大。
瑞湖高速共分4个标段，其中二标段（全长约9.1公里）是全线的控制性标段，涵盖8处隧道及路基、桥梁、互通工程等建设内容。
瑞湖高速是瑞安首个纳入国家“十四五”102项重大工程项目储备库和省“千项万亿”工程的重点项目，也是瑞安自主投资建设的第一条高速公路，创下瑞安交通建设史上投资规模最大、实施里程最长的新纪录。
该项目建成后，将彻底结束湖岭镇不通高速的历史，实现瑞安“镇镇通高速”目标，并有效串联甬莞高速、沈海高速和温州绕城高速，进一步完善浙江省高速公路网络，对促进瑞安东西部协同发展、优化区域交通格局具有重要意义。
来源：温州都市报
原标题：瑞湖高速首座隧道贯通 标志着瑞安东西向交通大动脉建设取得阶段性成果
记者 李雅
本文转自：温州新闻网 66wz.com

author: Campo Grande News
title: Instituto coloca 44 cidades sob alerta de temporal com vendaval
text: Instituto coloca 44 cidades sob alerta de temporal com vendaval Outro aviso, válido para todo o Estado, vai até domingo, véspera de Ano Novo O Inmet (Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia) colocou 44 cidades de Mato Grosso do Sul sob alerta de temporal das 17h às 21h desta sexta-feira (29). O aviso foi publicado no começo da tarde e indica que os ventos podem chegar aos 100 km/h. De acordo com o instituto, a previsão de que o acumulado de chuva chegue aos 100 milímetros e os ventos intensos provoquem queda de árvores. Ainda há possibilidade de granizo, corte de energia e alagamentos. Hoje, as cidades sob o aviso são Água Clara, Amambai, Anaurilândia, Angélica, Antônio João, Aparecida do Taboado, Aral Moreira, Bataguassu, Batayporã, Bela Vista, Brasilândia, Caarapó, Campo Grande, Coronel Sapucaia, Deodápolis, Douradinha, Dourados, Fátima do Sul, Glória de Dourados, Iguatemi. Também estão na lista Inocência, Itaporã, Itaquiraí, Ivinhema, Jateí, Juti, Laguna Carapã, Maracaju, Naviraí, Nova Alvorada do Sul, Nova Andradina, Novo Horizonte do Sul, Paranaíba, Paranhos, Ponta Porã, Ribas do Rio Pardo, Rio Brilhante, Santa Rita do Pardo, Selvíria, Sidrolândia, Tacuru, Taquarussu, Três Lagoas e Vicentina. É importante lembrar que já há outro aviso de temporal com vendaval, válido para todo o Estado. Neste caso, os ventos podem atingir os 60 km/h e o acumulado de chuva pode chegar aos 50 milímetros até o final da tarde do dia 31 de dezembro. Receba as principais notícias do Estado pelo Whats. [Clique aqui para acessar o canal do Campo Grande News](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va6UwSHHltY8c4OtUb0j).

author: iheart.com
title: Popular Snack Recalled In California Poses 'Life-Threatening' Health Risk | Newsradio 600 KOGO
text:
ZB Importing LLC recalled six varieties of Ulker Brand snack rolls, biscuits, and wafers" sold in California , on February 18th due to the undeclared presence of three common allergens.
According to the United States Food & Drug Administration , the recalled products, distributed to retail stores in 36 states, contain "undeclared wheat, egg and/or milk" which poses the risk of a "serious or life-threatening allergic reaction" to individuals allergic any of the three ingredients not listed on the product labels.
Consumers should avoid Ulker Brand snack rolls, biscuits, and wafers with UPC codes 8690766082307, 8690766086473, 8690504066828, 8690504114628, 8690504067979, and 8690504067986.
So far, there has been one complaint of an allergic reaction reported as a result of consuming the mislabeled Ulker Brand snack rolls, biscuits, and wafers. Officials are urging consumers who have already purchased a recalled roll, biscuit, or wafer to return the product to the place it was purchased for a full refund. Consumers are also being told to throw the item out if it is in their possession.
Concerned individuals with questions regarding the recalled products are encouraged to contact ZB Importing LLC at info@ziyad.com.
For additional information on the recalled products and to see photos, lot numbers, and expiration dates, check out the official recall on fda.gov .

author: L. Urdiales
title: Resiliencia en la espera, resiliencia en la financiación de la reforma
text: Dos décadas de espera por la obra en Trobajo del Camino no se habrían resuelto sin el fondo Next Generation de la Unión Europea, que aporta finalmente ese millón y medio largo que costará la obra. Se trata de transformar el cruce de la N-120 con la travesía urbana de la localidad en una solución a la altura de los tiempos, que permite el giro sin el cepo del semáforo que eternizaba la operación, en hora punta de forma desesperante.. La mitad del problema quedó resuelto en diciembre de 2023, cuando un vehículo chocó contra uno de los arcos de señalización y lo inutilizó.. Dos hileras de conos y balizas condicionan desde entonces el estatus de la circulación en la zona; desde entonces, también, la mitad del acceso del Polígono Industrial de Trobajo está encauzado a través de una vía de servicio que muere en un embudo, encajonado en mitad de la zona de paso de peregrinos del Camino de Santiago. Más de medio año en esas circunstancias describe la implicación de la administración en solucionar los problemas de León en materia de infraestructuras. «Con este ritmo, y esa planificación, es posible que soterren el tren antes de acabar la rotonda», valoraron algunas formaciones políticas atónitas por la marcha de las operaciones en torno a la carretera en la loma de Trobajo.. La historia del cruce de la N-120 que quiere ser rotonda es larga; la intrahistoria es intrigante. Desde el momento en el que el mes de diciembre cayó al suelo el semáforo, cada novedad deja en ridículo a la anterior referencia. Hasta el intento de culpar al Ayuntamiento de San Andrés por el bloqueo de la intersección cuando ya estaba en situación de comienzo legal (el 22 de diciembre de 2023, según describe el propio Gobierno de España en la respuesta a los senadores leoneses del PP que interpelaron por este torniquete.. Las dos décadas de espera por la reforma del cruce se van a alargar aún otro par de años; basta con que se lleve a cabo la previsión con el plazo de ejecución para que la rotonda se pueda vender como trofeo electoral en las locales de 2027.

author: @GDS_it
title: Marsala, è morto Giuseppe Chirco: ex insegnante di inglese, è stato arbitro per 50 anni
text:
Marsala piange la morte del professore Giuseppe Chirco. Aveva 85 anni ed è deceduto all'ospedale di Alcamo dove era ricoverato da qualche tempo. A piangere la sua morte, sia il mondo della scuola che quello dello sport. Chirco, infatti, era stato insegnante di inglese e per oltre 50 anni era iscritto all'associazione italiana arbitri. Lascia moglie e figli.
Molto conosciuto a Marsala per la sua professione. Diffusa la notizia del decesso, in tanti tra amici e conoscenti hanno voluto ricordare l'uomo ed esprimere vicinanza alla famiglia. Tra i primi, la Figc - Aia sezione Marsala che sul proprio profilo Facebook ha scritto: «La scorsa notte è deceduto all’età di 85 anni, l’arbitro benemerito Giuseppe Chirco, per tutti “Pino”. Era tesserato Aia da 68 anni, e dopo i primi anni da arbitro nel settore giovanile e regionale, raggiunse negli anni 60 la serie C come assistente, rimanendo in attività fino ai primi anni '70 per poi transitare nel ruolo di osservatore contribuendo alla formazione di diverse generazioni di arbitri fino agli ultimi anni ricoprendo il ruolo di tutor. Una figura storica della nostra sezione, un uomo garbato e gentile che ci mancherà tanto. Addio Caro Pino. Sentite condoglianze alla moglie alla moglie Cettina e ai familiari da parte del Presidente Biagio Girlando e di tutti gli arbitri della sezione di Marsala».
Pietro Ingargiola ha scritto: «Un pezzo di storia della nostra sezione, sicuramente una persona educata e perbene». «Sei stato un professore esemplare, non ti dimenticherò mai», scrive sui social un ex allievo. E ancora, c'è chi ricorda la sua dedizione per la famiglia «Hai messo sempre al primo posto moglie e figlia, nonostante avessi tanti impegni tra lavoro e passione», ha scritto un amico. E c'è anche il ricordo di ex colleghi: «Sempre disponibile a scuola, pronto a dispensare saggezza ai tuoi allievi».

author: hellenicshippingnews...
title: US natgas prices jump 5% to 14-week high on low storage build, rising demand
text:
U.S. natural gas futures jumped about 5% to a 14-week high on Thursday on a smaller-than-expected storage build, forecasts for more demand over the next two weeks than previously expected and a continued decline in output.
The demand forecasts were mostly higher on forecasts for hotter-than-normal weather in mid- to late-May that should boost the amount of gas power generators burn to keep air conditioners humming. An increase in the amount of gas flowing to liquefied natural gas (LNG) export plants on rising feedgas to Freeport LNG’s plant in Texas was also behind the demand forecasts.
The U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) said utilities added 79 billion cubic feet (bcf) of gas into storage during the week ended May 3.
That was smaller than the 85-bcf build analysts forecast in a Reuters poll and compares with an increase of 71 bcf in the same week last year and a five-year (2019-2023) average rise of 81 bcf for this time of year.
That increase left gas stockpiles around 33% above normal levels for this time of year.
Front-month gas futures NGc1 for June delivery on the New York Mercantile Exchange rose 10 cents, or 4.6%, to $2.287 per million British thermal units at 10:34 a.m. EDT (1434 GMT), putting the contract on track for its highest close since Jan. 29.
That kept the contract in overbought territory for a fifth day in a row for the first time since October 2023.
A lack of rapid price moves in recent weeks, meanwhile, has cut the front-month’s 30-day implied volatility NGATMIV to 47.8%, its lowest level since February 2022.
The market uses implied volatility to estimate likely price changes in the future. At-the-money 30-day implied volatility, a determinant of an option’s premium, has averaged 59.5% so far in 2024, down from 70.3% in 2023 and a five-year (2019-2023) average of 60.1%.
In the spot market, U.S. power and gas prices turned negative this week in Texas, California and Arizona as pipeline maintenance trapped gas in the Permian Shale in West Texas amid low demand for energy and ample hydropower in the West.
SUPPLY AND DEMAND
Financial firm LSEG said gas output in the Lower 48 U.S. states fell to an average of 96.9 billion cubic feet per day (bcfd) so far in May, down from 98.2 bcfd in April. That compares with a monthly record of 105.5 bcfd in December 2023.
On a daily basis, output was on track to drop by around 2.3 bcfd over the past six days to a preliminary 16-week low of 95.5 bcfd on Thursday.
Meteorologists projected weather across the Lower 48 states would go from mostly near-normal levels from May 9-15 to mostly warmer than normal from May 16-24.
LSEG forecast gas demand in the Lower 48, including exports, would slide from 94.0 bcfd this week to 91.8 bcfd next week. Those forecasts were higher than LSEG’s outlook on Wednesday.
Gas flows to the seven big U.S. LNG export plants rose from an average of 11.9 bcfd in April to 12.4 bcfd so far in May with the return of Freeport LNG’s plant in Texas from maintenance and inspection work. That compares with a monthly record of 14.7 bcfd in December.
The amount of gas flowing to the 2.1-bcfd Freeport plant was on track to rise to a 16-week high of 1.7 bcfd, up from an average of 1.3 bcfd over the past week and 0.4 bcfd in April.
Source: Reuters (Reporting by Scott DiSavino; Editing by Kirsten Donovan and Emelia Sithole-Matarise)
2024-05-10

author: Sindhu Hariharan
title: Ideas2IT sets aside 33% stake in company for employees - Times of India
text: CHENNAI: Dallas and Chennai-based product engineering firm Ideas2IT Technologies has announced a unique employee ownership programme wherein its employees will receive a 33% ownership stake. This is a first-of-its-kind move in the corporate landscape that has been so far limited to ESOPs, bonus, profit sharing or other options.Valued at over $100 million, Ideas2IT is allocating a significant 33% ownership stake to its employees, thereby rewarding long serving employees, many of whom have spent over a decade with them. To start with, Ideas2IT will grant this equity to the first 50 employees of the company followed by another 100 in line to join this pool. Unlike traditional ESOP plans that vest over time, this initiative offers direct equity ownership to employees. The equity also remains with the employees even if they part ways with the company, without affecting their salary structure. \"Ideas2IT is not merely distributing shares but handing over true founder privileges, including a say in the company's trajectory,\" the company said. \"The selection process is different from how ESOPs are typically allocated, as it focuses on values-driven contribution rather than just skill sets,\" it added.Founded in 2009 by Murali Vivekanandan and Bhavani Raman, Ideas2IT creates and delivers software to companies like Microsoft, Ericsson, Siemens and Roche. “The motivation behind this unprecedented initiative is an emotional commitment to build a top-tier product engineering company from India, with employees as true partners,” said Ideas2IT founder Murali Vivekanandan.This initiative follows a previous programme wherein Ideas2IT gifted 100 Maruti Suzuki cars to its trusted employees in 2022. The company is now doubling down on this promise by adding another 50 cars this year. With a team of 700 employees in total, Ideas2IT's expertise spans across various domains including AI/ML, cloud and application development and modernization.
